## üëã About Me

Lawyer by degree, developer by passion.  
I left the courtroom to dive headfirst into the world of code, where I found the freedom to create, make mistakes, and grow every day.

I'm a jiu-jitsu fighter, which taught me through sweat and struggle the value of discipline, resilience, and focus. I carry those lessons into every project I work on.

Also, I'm the kind of person who stops in the street to pet any animal that crosses my path.

I'm constantly learning, building, and carving out my space in tech, with my feet on the ground and my heart in everything I do.
